hero.description: A community-first token unifying the global Persian diaspora around the timeless principles of Cyrus the Great—freedom, tolerance, and human dignity. 100% diaspora owned. 50% secured by DAO for long-term public governance. No VC. No pre-sale.
hero.disclaimer: CYRUS is a community meme token. Not a security. No promise of appreciation. Available exclusively on Coinbase Base.

philosophy.title: The Legacy of
philosophy.description: 2,500 years ago, Cyrus the Great founded the first empire built on tolerance and human rights. Today, his descendants carry forward that legacy.

empire.title: The
empire.description: At its height, the Achaemenid Empire stretched from Egypt to India, united not by conquest but by respect for all peoples.

diaspora.title: The Persian
diaspora.description: Today, over 8 million Iranians live outside Iran, forming one of the world's most successful and influential diaspora communities.

tokenomics.title: Fair Launch
tokenomics.description: 100% diaspora owned. 50% secured by DAO for long-term public governance. Transparent, community-first distribution.

governance.title: Community
governance.description: The CYRUS DAO puts decision-making power in the hands of token holders. Every voice matters.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: The CYRUS Foundation is led by dedicated individuals committed to the preservation of Persian heritage and the empowerment of the global diaspora. Initial stewardship by the Pahlavi family with planned transition to full public governance.
leadership.publicStewardshipText: The founding board, led by members of the Pahlavi family, will guide CYRUS through its first two years. Additional board members may be selected at board discretion. A planned transition to full public governance will follow, ensuring the community ultimately controls its own destiny.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.a1: CYRUS is a community token honoring the legacy of Cyrus the Great and uniting the global Persian diaspora. It's built on Base (Ethereum L2) for fast, low-cost transactions.
faq.a2: You can buy CYRUS using USDT on our bonding curve. Connect your wallet, approve USDT spending, and purchase tokens directly from the contract.
faq.a3: The CYRUS DAO is a decentralized autonomous organization that governs the treasury and makes community decisions. Token holders vote on proposals.
faq.q4: When can I transfer my tokens?
faq.a4: Transfers are locked until Nowruz 2026 (March 21, 2026) to ensure fair distribution and prevent early dumping.
faq.a5: No. CYRUS is a community meme token with no promise of profit or appreciation. It exists for cultural and community purposes.
